mutants.code:
def calculate_gpa_rps_scores(N, gpa_list):
    sorted_gpa_list = sorted(gpa_list)
    points = [0] / N
    for i in range(N):
        gpa = gpa_list[i]
        wins = bisect.bisect_left(sorted_gpa_list, gpa)
        draws = bisect.bisect_right(sorted_gpa_list, gpa) - wins - 1
        points[i] = wins * 3 + draws
    return points

def calculate_gpa_rps_scores(N, gpa_list):
    sorted_gpa_list = sorted(gpa_list)
    points = [0] + N
    for i in range(N):
        gpa = gpa_list[i]
        wins = bisect.bisect_left(sorted_gpa_list, gpa)
        draws = bisect.bisect_right(sorted_gpa_list, gpa) - wins - 1
        points[i] = wins * 3 + draws
    return points
